programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.sub-title: Leonardo from the National Gallery London
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. A remarkable event occurred at London’s National Gallery when the largest ever collection of Leonardo’s surviving paintings was assembled in a unique exhibition: Leonardo da Vinci: Painter at the Court of Milan. Leonardo is recognised as perhaps the greatest painter and sculptor of all time but there was no end to his talents. This film tells his life story and expands on Leonardo the visionary and inventor from the place where he lived out his final years at Château du Clos Luce in France, concluding that Leonardo da Vinci was perhaps the very embodiment of the spirit of the Renaissance.

programme.title: We are Artists not Vandals
programme.desc: Follow the artists who dress the streets from the ground to the walls. In each episode, we will introduce you to one or several street artists who will make you discover their passion or their work for some. The street art is an artistic movement and a mode of expression, which asserts itself or claims so from the end of the 20th century. However, some people still find it difficult to consider it as a real art form. We will try to prove them wrong.

programme.title: Private Tour
programme.sub-title: Giacometti, between tradition and avant-garde at the Musee Maillol
programme.desc: For everyone who haven’t a chance to go to the museum, "Private Tour" propose you a private tour in 13 minutes to the best exposition of the moment with a professionnal or an expository commissioner. Private Tour takes you to the discovery of the exhibition "Giacometti, between tradition and avant-garde" at the Musee Maillol. This exhibition shows how Giacometti evolved from style to style. It tells his story from the first busts he sculpted at the age of 13, to the realization of large-scale sculptures towards the end of his life.

programme.title: An hour with
programme.desc: Classical, Modern, Contemporary Art… From ancient to contemporary art, discover the masterpieces and the artists of today. Take an hour break to discover the work of an Italian painter, Titien. You will discover his labour with Pastoral concert, The resurrection of Christ or Venus with organist.

programme.title: An hour with
programme.desc: Classical, Modern, Contemporary Art… From ancient to contemporary art, discover the masterpieces and the artists of today. Take an hour break to discover the work of a French painter, Georges Seurat. You will discover his labour with « Ile de France » landscape, Study for « a Sunday afternoon at the grande jatte », Study for « La grande jatte ».

programme.title: Video Art
programme.desc: Street art, performances, digital art... Because the new forms of Art and their invigorating character, even iconoclastic, have been able to attract a new public until now refractory to go inside the interior of our beautiful museums.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. Actor and charmer Nigel Havers and his canny, deal-making chum (and ex-agent) Michael Whitehall explore the West Country. Travelling by Bentley and TVR, they’ll have £400 each and expert advice from Margie Cooper and James Braxton. But what will do best at the auction... Nigel’s old cockle bucket or Michael’s tambourine? Plus there’s a trip to see some Bristol Savages and bit of Georgian elegance with the story of ‘The King of Bath’.

programme.title: Within the frame
programme.desc: Discover or re-discover the masterpieces of the greatest painters of history through our documentary series Within The Frame. From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. Claude Monet is probably the best-known painter of the impressionist movement. Indeed, the term “impressionism” was derived from his painting “Impression Rising Sun” (1872). This exhibition retraces the great stages in Monet’s prolific career while dwelling on paintings of this master that cannot be ignored: the “Saint Lazare Station”, the “Poppies near Argenteuil”, the “Haystacks” and the “Rouen Cathedral” exposed all around the world in different museum such as the Museum of Fine Arts in Boston without forgetting his “Water-lilies” exposed at the Orangerie museum in Paris. Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. To mark the 500th anniversary of Raphaels death, a major exhibition has opened in Rome. Exhibition on Screen had exclusive access to this event, which brings together over 200 major works by this Renaissance master. The film explores the exhibition and sheds new light on the work of this often misunderstood or, on the contrary, idealized artist.

programme.title: Putiphars travel guide
programme.sub-title: Amsterdam, Heir Of The Golden Century
programme.desc: Petrus Putiphar is a travel guide author. This professional traveller locates the good places to visit like museums, gardens and places to go, he surveys the city, while sharing his discoveries and giving his observations. We follow him in his wanderings in the huge capitals of the 19th century like Paris, London, Vienna, Constantinople, Amsterdam or Saint Petersburg.

programme.title: Within the frame
programme.desc: Discover or re-discover the masterpieces of the greatest painters of history through our documentary series Within The Frame. From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. The man with the long greying beard who we find in this self-portrait is the painter Camille Pissarro (1830-1903). A keen follower of the Impressionist movement, the artist specialised in landscapes around Paris, often painted in winter, such as the “Chestnut Tress at Louveciennes” or the urban landscapes of Montmartre. Towards the end of his life, his painting technique changed and he turned towards Neo-Impressionism, for example in the “Seine River and Louvre Palace”.Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Parish enclosures: Books of stone books of wood
programme.desc: Parish enclosures are the hallmark of Western Brittany, formulating its soul and being from the late 15th to the 17th century. The ultimate accord of the tragic, the sacred, the aesthetic and the religious, such is the journey to which we invite you.

Discover or rediscover the masterpieces of the Dutch national museum Rijksmuseum with artists such as Rembrandt, Vermeer...

programme.title: My little Museum
programme.desc: My little Museum is Art History retold through funny anecdotes and backstage trivias by Alicia Flipo. With her wacky demeanor, her inventiveness and her quirky sense of humor, Alicia stages these small Art tales so that once and for all, you could remember the Big stories!

programme.title: Art investigation
programme.desc: Art Investigation is a documentary series, each episode is devoted to a particular work. Emile Zola and Paul Cezanne met on the school benches in Aix en Provence. From their "brotherhood of genius

programme.title: You, Myself and Art
programme.desc: Featuring more than 20 specialists this documentary series explores who we are through the medium of art, spanning from the earliest days of mankind and into the future. Featuring more than 20 specialists this documentary series explores who we are through the medium of art, spanning from the earliest days of mankind, through our collective history, past today and into the future. programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. TV chefs Aldo Zilli and Ching He-Huang do battle on this Road Trip around South Eastern England, aided by experts Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw. Aldo plumps for a gold ring despite expert advice while Ching hopes antiques with an eastern origin will far well at auction in north London.Aldo stops off to meet a 200 year old named ‘Jill’ to hear how she supplied locals with flour. And animal lover Ching learns how one man faced ridicule and ruin while trying to protect cattle in the 19th century.

programme.title: Artists Workshop
programme.desc: In the Artists workshop series, we offer you a privileged meeting with an artist, or the discovery of an artist or an important place for the history of art. Whether they are painters, visual artists, sculptors... These people all have the same passion for art and this show is an opportunity to enter their different universes, to discover what drives them, inspires them and maybe that will give rise to vocations.

programme.title: Putiphars travel guide
programme.desc: Petrus Putiphar is a travel guide author. This professional traveller locates the good places to visit like museums, gardens and places to go, he surveys the city, while sharing his discoveries and giving his observations. We follow him in his wanderings in the huge capitals of the 19th century like Paris, London, Vienna, Constantinople, Amsterdam or Saint Petersburg. We will visit Istanbul, from the 19th century when the city was still called Constantinople, to the present day. Byzantium, Constantinople, Istanbul... the city with multiple names also has many faces. Between its seven hills, architectural treasures confront each other: the Basilica of Saint Sophia, the Grand Bazaar... In the humid heat or in the aromas of a Turkish coffee, the city reinvents itself all the time.

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.sub-title: Vincent Van Gogh: A New Way of Seeing
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. Vincent van Goghs life remains shrouded in mystery: madness, illness, suicide - all the ingredients to create a myth. With complete and unprecedented access to the treasures of Amsterdams Van Gogh Museum, this documentary sheds light on both one of the worlds favorite artists and the museums rich and unique collection. Discover these marvelous masterpieces on the big screen, while guests including world-renowned curators and art historians offer their interpretations and explanations of Van Goghs work.

programme.title: Within the frame
programme.desc: Discover or re-discover the masterpieces of the greatest painters of history through our documentary series Within The Frame. From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. Between 1883 and 1926 Claude Monet lived in a house at Giverny where he created a flower garden and a water garden, which provided the inspiration for his series of paintings known as the “Water Lilies”. The “Water-Lily Pond” portrays this garden, with its water lilies and the Japanese bridge in the background. In the series of eight large canvases on the theme, housed in the Musee de l’Orangerie in Paris, Monet introduces variations in light according to the hour of the day.Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Draw me what you see
programme.desc: The talented illustrator Fred Benaglia shares his vision of drawing and gives us practical advice, for young and old drawers! The talented illustrator Fred Benaglia shares his vision of drawing and gives us practical advice, for young and old drawers! A pencil and a sheet of paper, you dont need much material to make a drawing you can be proud of! To achieve this, you will be guided by Fred Benaglia, creator of Adelidelo, the mischievous little heroine of Pomme dApi. Fabulous beings or objects will appear in no time: a horse, a car, a dragon, a tree, a dog, a princess, a cat, a flower, a witch, a magician...

programme.title: Art Quiz
programme.desc: Test your knowledge and your memory in fine arts, architecture, photography, street art and a dozen other topics with our Art Quiz popups !

programme.title: Sketchbook
programme.desc: An intimate instructional documentary series, Sketchbook takes us onto the desks and into the lives of talented artists and animators. Each episode focuses on a single artist teaching us how to draw a single iconic character from a Walt Disney Animation Studios film. programme.title: Art investigation
programme.desc: Art Investigation is a documentary series, each episode is devoted to a particular work. This episode of Art Investigation traces the enigmatic journey of “the Idol” through the centuries, a statuette of uncertain origins. Its acquisition in the 18th century by the Breton art lover Christophe-Paul de Robien for his curiosity cabinet only adds to the mystery. Eager to learn more about this piece, he gathered little information, to his great dismay. Indeed, at the time, little or nothing was known about this statuette. During the French Revolution, his collection of more than 8,000 pieces was seized by the state. “The idol” was then kept in the Musee des Beaux-Arts in Rennes. With no certainty as to its origins, it was finally forgotten for many decades. It was not until the 1990s that the piece reappeared, crushed under a cupboard. Its restoration prompted experts to carry out more in-depth analyses. The results will allow the secrets of the statuette to be discovered.

programme.title: Graffiti World
programme.desc: Graffiti World is a short program dedicated to contemporary urban art around the world. Each episode explores a specific city, highlighting iconic works of street art. Graffiti World is a short program dedicated to contemporary urban art around the world. Each episode explores a specific city, highlighting iconic works of street art. Local soundscape accompanies the images for an authentic, commentary-free immersion. The program showcases the creativity and diversity of artistic expression in public spaces. An invitation to discover the richness of graffiti as an art form in its own right.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. Two luvvies from the world of stage and TV, Ruth Madoc and Su Pollard, best known for their appearances in sitcom Hi-De-Hi, are antique hunting with Phil Serrell and Raj Bisram. Setting off from the Welsh border town of Monmouth they head for auction in Congleton, Cheshire. Ruth also gets to find out about the incredible 19th century nurse – and it’s not Florence Nightingale – whilst Su visits ancient Roman town Caerleon and finds time for an amphitheatre showdown with Phil. And Su attempts to resolve an age old mystery...does Phil wear a wig?

programme.title: Museum Tour
programme.sub-title: The Biblical Message - In the eye of Marc Chagall
programme.desc: Museum Tour is a series that invites the viewer to discover unique which, for the artists chosen, have been incubators of creativity and a source of inspiration. Under their patronage, some of those sites have been turned into museums or foundations where their memory and work have picked up a life of their own.Each of the episodes will tell the story uniting the artist with a particular place, seeking intimacy in the process.This show’s agenda is decidedly visual. Works of art and the places in which they’re set will be filmed in such a way as to arouse strong emotions, thus placing the viewer in the spot, as if they were present in the flesh. This angle for the spectacular and search for beauty will enhance the accessibility of the series for an uninformed audience.A family-friendly documentary series which, beyond the fascinating information provided, offers a sight, sound and emotional journey into a captivating, palpable and contemporary form.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Travelers is the "city guide" for art lovers ... But not only that. Exhibitions, museums, galleries, artists but also hotels, restaurants, bars and shops ... In short, everything you need to prepare for your next weekend is in Travelers. Today, Travelers takes you to Basel, Switzerland, a city renowned for its culture and art. Well start by visiting the old town, one of the most beautiful and best preserved in Europe. We will look for one of the 180 fountains in the city and visit the Tinquely Museum. We will go to the Congress Palace and see the Roche Tower, the largest tower in Switzerland.

programme.title: Art Quiz
programme.desc: Test your knowledge and your memory in fine arts, architecture, photography, street art and a dozen other topics with our Art Quiz popups !

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.sub-title: David Hockney at the Royal Academy of Arts
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. David Hockney, generally considered one of Britains most popular artists, is enjoying worldwide success, with exhibitions in London, New York, Paris and elsewhere attracting millions of visitors. Now in his eighties, Hockney shows no sign of letting up or losing his legendary audacity. This film reveals intimate, previously unseen interviews and focuses on two successful exhibitions that took place in 2012 and 2016 at the Royal Academy of Arts in London.

programme.title: Masterpiece
programme.desc: A team of experts reveal the untold mysteries and surprising techniques behind some of the world’s most famous paintings in order to recreate them. Can the reconstruction ever live up the original? Can only a master create a masterpiece? Rembrandt van Rijn made the painting "Jeremiah" at the age of 24. It’s an incredibly complex painting in which all his talent comes together: The enchanting effect between sketchy finish and the small detail. But also the expression of all the different materials such as velvet, metal, red coral and rock. Team member Michel van de Laar has restored Rembrandt’s work in the past and discovered that there is something special hidden in the paint: A hair by Rembrandt. Also in the reconstruction, a hair will be put back. And not just any hair: an exciting search leads to a descendant of Rembrandt.

You will find a wide variety of works such as Paul Toupet or The Kid, artists who are not very well known but whose works are worth a look.

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. This eagerly-awaited exhibition at the Royal Academy of Arts was the first-ever retrospective devoted to the portraiture of Édouard Manet. Covering the entire career of this enigmatic and sometimes controversial artist, the exhibition brought together works from Europe, Asia and the United States. Manets portraiture has never been the subject of an exhibition, although it represents around half of his artistic output. He painted his family, friends and the literary, political and artistic figures of the day, bringing to life not only his subjects but also Parisian society.

programme.title: Private Tour
programme.desc: For everyone who haven’t a chance to go to the museum, "Private Tour" propose you a private tour in 13 minutes to the best exposition of the moment with a professionnal or an expository commissioner. Private Tour takes you to the discovery of the exhibition "Dancing Gross" at LaM in Villeneuve dAscq, the museum of modern, contemporary and raw art. This exhibition presents works made by artists, dancers or not, and questions the themes of gesture and movement. It can be a simple photograph immortalizing a movement, a dance, or even reproductions of merry-go-rounds which will remind you the period of childhood.

programme.title: An hour with
programme.desc: Classical, Modern, Contemporary Art… From ancient to contemporary art, discover the masterpieces and the artists of today. Take an hour break to discover the work of a French painter, Jean-François Millet. You will discover his labour with Naked woman sleeping, Two bathers or The church at greville.

programme.title: An hour with
programme.desc: Classical, Modern, Contemporary Art… From ancient to contemporary art, discover the masterpieces and the artists of today. Take an hour break to discover the work of a French painter, Theodore Gericault. You will discover his labour with An Officer of the Imperial horse guards, Heroic landscape with fisherman or The Horse race.

programme.title: Video Art
programme.desc: Street art, performances, digital art... Because the new forms of Art and their invigorating character, even iconoclastic, have been able to attract a new public until now refractory to go inside the interior of our beautiful museums.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. TV chefs Aldo Zilli and Ching He-Huang do battle on this Road Trip around South Eastern England, aided by experts Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw. Aldo plumps for a gold ring despite expert advice while Ching hopes antiques with an eastern origin will far well at auction in north London.Aldo stops off to meet a 200 year old named ‘Jill’ to hear how she supplied locals with flour. And animal lover Ching learns how one man faced ridicule and ruin while trying to protect cattle in the 19th century.

programme.title: Within the frame
programme.desc: Discover or re-discover the masterpieces of the greatest painters of history through our documentary series Within The Frame. From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. With his considerable production of more than 6,000 works, Auguste Renoir took part in the emergence of the impressionist movement even if he were to distance himself from it later to assert a more personal style. This visit begins with his most famous masterpiece, the “Ball at the Moulin de la Galette”. You will also rediscover the “Dance in the City” and the “Piano Lesson” exposed at the Joslyn art museum as well as “Claude Renoir in Clown Costume”, a portrait of his son who was later to become one of France’s greatest film directors exposed at the Orangerie Museum in France Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Artists Workshop
programme.desc: In the Artists workshop series, we offer you a privileged meeting with an artist, or the discovery of an artist or an important place for the history of art. Whether they are painters, visual artists, sculptors... These people all have the same passion for art and this show is an opportunity to enter their different universes, to discover what drives them, inspires them and maybe that will give rise to vocations.

programme.title: Art investigation
programme.sub-title: The New Born - Georges De La Tour
programme.desc: Art Investigation is a documentary series, each episode is devoted to a particular work. Georges de la Tours "The New born" is one of the most popular French paintings in the world. However, its author has been completely forgotten for more than three centuries. The painting, whose original meaning was only realised at the end of the 20th century, was successively attributed to painters from the northern schools or to masters of French or Spanish painting. It was only a matter of time before this great painter of the 17th century was never rehabilitated. When he was discovered, his paintings were exhibited all over the world and the exhibitions devoted to him were attended by record numbers.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. Two luvvies from the world of stage and TV, Ruth Madoc and Su Pollard, best known for their appearances in sitcom Hi-De-Hi, are antique hunting with Phil Serrell and Raj Bisram. Setting off from the Welsh border town of Monmouth they head for auction in Congleton, Cheshire. Ruth also gets to find out about the incredible 19th century nurse – and it’s not Florence Nightingale – whilst Su visits ancient Roman town Caerleon and finds time for an amphitheatre showdown with Phil. And Su attempts to resolve an age old mystery...does Phil wear a wig?

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. The Sunflowers are among Van Goghs most famous paintings. The Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam has dedicated an exhibition to these works and Exhibition on screen, which was given exclusive access to the event, guides us through the exhibition to investigate the mysteries surrounding these paintings. The film also takes us to Tokyo, Philadelphia, London and Munich to follow the 5 main works in the exhibition.

programme.title: Private Tour
programme.sub-title: Bernard van Orley, Brussels and the Renaissance
programme.desc: For everyone who haven’t a chance to go to the museum, "Private Tour" propose you a private tour in 13 minutes to the best exposition of the moment with a professionnal or an expository commissioner. Private Tour takes you to discover the exhibition "Bernard Van Orley, Brussels and the Renaissane" at BOZAR in Brussels. This exhibition aims to rediscover the work of this great Brussels painter of the first half of the 16th century. He made paintings, but also tapestries. You will find his masterpiece "the polyptych of Job and Lazarus".

programme.title: Origami
programme.desc: A square piece of paper and some patience, this is all you need to transform a flat surface into a superb tridimensional piece of art! Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Little Sketches
programme.desc: In 64 fun episodes, Gia-Haï Phan teaches you all the sketching techniques you need.

programme.title: Sketchbook
programme.sub-title: The position of the body in dance
programme.desc: An intimate instructional documentary series, Sketchbook takes us onto the desks and into the lives of talented artists and animators. Each episode focuses on a single artist teaching us how to draw a single iconic character from a Walt Disney Animation Studios film. As we learn the steps to drawing these characters, we also discover that the artists themselves each have a unique story to tell about how they made their way to Disney and their chosen character. From the creators of Chefs Table, this exclusive experience will give viewers of all ages a new understanding of how these beloved characters come to life on screen while introducing them to a new cast of real-life characters along way. Raphael Federici (street artist), Marine Goodmorning (illustrator), Luca Fiore (cartoonist) and Harry Boudchicha (drawing teacher) reveal their best drawing techniques. Each episode focuses on a specific subject:movement, oil painting, shadows, hair... For the first 10 minutes, each artist gives a theoretical lesson illustrated by sketches. Then they each start working on their creation. Finally, they end with a debrief, comparingand explaining their techniques.

programme.title: Putiphars travel guide
programme.desc: Petrus Putiphar is a travel guide author. This professional traveller locates the good places to visit like museums, gardens and places to go, he surveys the city, while sharing his discoveries and giving his observations. We follow him in his wanderings in the huge capitals of the 19th century like Paris, London, Vienna, Constantinople, Amsterdam or Saint Petersburg.

programme.title: The decisive moment
programme.desc: In each episode of the decisive moment, we welcome a photographer whom we have asked to select three photos that have marked their life and their career. Whether they are reporters, portraitists or fashion photographers, they all have the same passion and will share it with us. In this episode, we will meet Ricky Powell, photographer. He has photographed some of the biggest legends in New York and in the world. He likes that you can get around New York fairly easily because it makes street photography easier. According to him, street photography is a subject that offers infinite possibilities.

programme.title: Graffiti World
programme.desc: Graffiti World is a short program dedicated to contemporary urban art around the world. Each episode explores a specific city, highlighting iconic works of street art. Graffiti World is a short program dedicated to contemporary urban art around the world. Each episode explores a specific city, highlighting iconic works of street art. Local soundscape accompanies the images for an authentic, commentary-free immersion. The program showcases the creativity and diversity of artistic expression in public spaces. An invitation to discover the richness of graffiti as an art form in its own right.

programme.title: Within the frame
programme.desc: Discover or re-discover the masterpieces of the greatest painters of history through our documentary series Within The Frame. From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. A key artist of the Italian Renaissance, Raffaello Santi (1483-1520) developed a classical art form, based on drawing, which made him the model for many painters in the following centuries. His favourite theme was the Madonna: you can admire, for example, “The Sistine Madonna” in Dresden and the “The Virgin and Child with St John the Baptist” in the Louvre. Notice the gentle harmony and the delicate sensuality in “The Three Graces” or the powerful human presence in “The Portrait of Baldassare Castiglione”.Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Museum stories
programme.desc: From the most far creation to the most recent, discover a new museum to travel in a different part of the history. The Museum of Hunting and Nature in Paris opens the doors of the imagination of our forests, our jungles, our savannah, and offers a very special experience, to the discovery of animals, and of the relationship, sometimes tragic, sometimes sublime, that we have with them. It is an ode to nature, elevated to the rank of art, and to its wild, simple, ferocious beauty.

programme.title: Museum stories
programme.desc: From the most far creation to the most recent, discover a new museum to travel in a different part of the history. What is the Arab world? It is not easy to define this expression as it brings together territories as immense as they are diverse, cultures which share common traits but which each have their specificities. The Museum of the Institute of the Arab World endeavors to offer a vision of this world as rich as it is diverse, through numerous archaeological pieces, treasures of history and culture. But also, thanks to contemporary works, which help to tell what the Arab world is today, in a world shaken by cultural globalization and the questioning of the identities inherent in our modern society.

programme.title: A special day
programme.desc: Museum takes you behind the scenes of prestigious institutions and lets you experience a special day by immersing yourself in the daily life of an art world professional. In this episode, we will spend a special day with Jef Aerosol, one of the pioneers of street art. This stencil artist is the sponsor of SolidArt, a contemporary art fair unlike any other, where the money raised helps children go on vacation. To celebrate the opening of the fair, he worked on a performance. We will follow him throughout this day of preparations.

programme.title: A special day
programme.desc: Museum takes you behind the scenes of prestigious institutions and lets you experience a special day by immersing yourself in the daily life of an art world professional. In this episode, we will spend a special day in Poissy, in the Villa Savoye, one of the buildings considered as one of the emblematic works of one of the greatest architects of the 20th century, Le Corbusier. It is now open to the public and we will present it to you.

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.sub-title: Goya: Visions of Flesh and Blood
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. Francisco Goya, considered the founder of modern art, is Spains most acclaimed artist. As well as a gifted observer of Spanish life and its turbulent past, he is a gifted portraitist and social commentator. With Goya, the art of portraiture reached new heights. This major exhibition at Londons National Gallery brings his genius back into the spotlight. Through a formidable collection of unique works and letters by Goya, we analyze the man himself and the world he painted.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. Two legends of British comedy, Ronni Ancona and Jan Ravens are joined on this Road Trip by antiquers Phil Serrell and James Braxton. Starting in the North Yorkshire town of Redcar they’ll head for auction in Stockport in Cheshire. Jan gets rather carried away and spends every single penny of her entire budget. While Ronni gets a kick out of a very kitsch glass boot. A quick detour sees Jan find out why Hartlepudlians thought a monkey was a Frenchman and Ronni is left open mouthed when Braxton takes off his clothes. Crikey!

programme.desc: Test your knowledge and your memory in fine arts, architecture, photography, street art and a dozen other topics with our Art Quiz popups !

programme.title: Art investigation
programme.desc: Art Investigation is a documentary series, each episode is devoted to a particular work. It is one of the masterpieces of the Nancy Museum of Fine Arts. First attributed to Michelangelo and then to the Italian painter Guido Reni, "The Annunciation" remained a painting shrouded in mystery. But in 1948, its true attribution was discovered with astonishment. The artist was none other than the great genius of Italian Renaissance painting: Michelangelo Merisi, known as Caravaggio. Since then, art historians have been investigating the incredible story of "The Annunciation".

programme.title: My little Museum
programme.desc: My little Museum is Art History retold through funny anecdotes and backstage trivias by Alicia Flipo. With her wacky demeanor, her inventiveness and her quirky sense of humor, Alicia stages these small Art tales so that once and for all, you could remember the Big stories!

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. Top Italian cooks Antonio Carluccio and Gennaro Contraldo are on a Road Trip around East Anglia. Restaurateurs, writers and old friends the ‘greedy Italians’ will be foraging for antiques in the company of experts David Harper and James Braxton. Watch out for some ‘explosive’ bargaining and an extremely tasty risotto! When he’s not shopping Antonio learns about the brave fisherman of Suffolk who saved mariners’ lives while risking their own. And, Gennaro has a trip to take a peek at a very special bird.

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. In June 2017, a major exhibition opened in Paris at the Musee dOrsay. For the first time, this exhibition brought together all Cezannes portraits. This was an opportunity to analyze Cezannes work with the help of international experts and to tour the rooms of the National Portrait Gallery in London and the National Gallery of Art in Washington.

programme.title: Within the frame

From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. Founded at the end of the 19th century by the collector Richard Wallace, this private museum in London houses a truly beautiful collection of European paintings. Amongst others, one can admire “The Laughing Cavalier” by Frans Hals or Rembrandt’s portrait of “Titus, the Artist’s Son”. French painting of the 18th century, in Gallant and Rococo vein, is particularly well represented, including none other than the masterpiece of licentious painting: “The Swing” by Fragonard.Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. In 2013, Norway celebrated the 150th anniversary of the birth of Edvard Munch (1863-1944), one of the most prominent figures in modern art. Munch 150, co-produced by the National Museum and the Munch Museum, is already being hailed as "the exhibition of a lifetime". Public interest is enormous, as evidenced by the record-breaking $120 million public auction result for one of his four paintings, The Scream. This presentation will take you behind the scenes of how this exhibition came to be, as well as including a guided tour of Norway, outlining the biography of this man whose life spanned the mid-19th century to the German occupation during the Second World War.

programme.title: Earth from Above
programme.sub-title: Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 1
programme.desc: Earth from Above is a documentary series presented by the photographer Yann Arthus-Bertrand and inspired by his best-selling book, aimed at confronting and examining the main issues facing the planet. The story of our planet, so alive and so fragile, is told by men and women from all over the world, all committed and passionate. A portrait of our planet that is both magical and realistic, moving and ingenious. Animals represent 2/3 of the species on earth. We are increasingly concerned about our impact on the world. But what place does man have for the wild animal? Discover how it is possible to reintroduce wild animals in South Africa, or the disaster that took place with the sea lions in Namibia, and also how to preserve rhinos or other animals in biodiversity. There, women and men manage to protect wildlife every day.

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. Lets hit the roads of France to discover shellfish. Well visit Brittany, then the Normandy coast where fishing is the regional sport, and Corsica, where the far northeast of the island lives to the rhythm of lobster. Julie takes us to cook lobster, crab with a very special recipe, and langoustines.

programme.title: Origami
programme.desc: A square piece of paper and some patience, this is all you need to transform a flat surface into a superb tridimensional piece of art! programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. Today, Julie takes you on a bread trail to uncover the dedicated artisan bakers and millers. Her adventure will lead her through the Libourne region, then onwards to the North of France, the Ardèche, and the Aisne, where bakers have transformed bread into a powerful catalyst for social cohesion. While some individuals may avoid bread, particularly due to gluten-related concerns, others have chosen to reposition it at the forefront of the dining experience by championing its nutritional benefits. This commitment is shared by several chefs whom Julie will meet at the conclusion of her expedition.

programme.title: Luanas Kitchen
programme.desc: Surrounded by her relatives and her guests who are passionate about good food, the most French of Italian women invites us into her kitchen to create tasty seasonal recipes. With a wave of her magic wand, Luana improvises delicious meals on the run and simmers the leftovers from the weekend to make a real treat. Luana cooks with the interpreter of the flagship title of Frozen: Anaïs Delva. Together, they will prepare two 100% vegetarian recipes, a philosophy adopted by the singer. On the menu: grilled zucchini fettucini, white beans with pesto and a vegetarian burger. Proof that its possible to enjoy vegetarian dishes without going hungry!

programme.title: Luanas Kitchen
programme.desc: Surrounded by her relatives and her guests who are passionate about good food, the most French of Italian women invites us into her kitchen to create tasty seasonal recipes. With a wave of her magic wand, Luana improvises delicious meals on the run and simmers the leftovers from the weekend to make a real treat. In this episode, Luana Belmondo welcomes Delphine Malachard, who is gluten intolerant. Together, they cook gluten-free recipes. On the menu: chocolate souffle and vanilla and red fruit financiers.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Crafting
programme.desc: Passionate crafters are given the opportunity to turn their hobby into a business. Three hobby crafters present their works for the first time at Brancepeth Castle Craft Fair in Durham. Occupational therapist Olivia dyes her own yarn and produces hand-woven pieces, ex-builder Neil makes quirky metal ornaments and Wendi now makes her own glass pieces uses the art of fusing - and for the fair she even learns the art of glass blowing.

programme.title: Vegetarian Delights
programme.desc: Keep calm and become vegetarian! It’s long been proved that a plant-based diet could prevent and even cure a lot of diseases. We believe that it’s not only mainstream, but it’s also a lifestyle which could turn around the attitude to food and the human body. Our carefully selected recipes will be a guide to the new healthy and peaceful life.

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. Julie takes you through the Pyrenees Orientales, then Corsica, before making a stop on the Côte dAzur, and concludes her journey between Rungis and Paris... all to explore the world of citrus fruits! These fruits add flavor, zest, and seasoning to any recipe, making them indispensable in the kitchen. They bring the warmth and sunshine of the South of France and the exoticism of distant lands. While were all familiar with lemons, clementines, and grapefruits, Julie introduces us to a thousand other varieties.

programme.title: Health Explored with Mike Wahl
programme.sub-title: Morocco - Sands of Time Part I
programme.desc: Health Explored delves deep into the subject of global health, revealing that well-being isn’t just an internal state but is also influenced by community, culture, a passion for helping others, and the capacity to challenge our own limits. This series is about health and our connection to the natural world, the resilience of the human spirit, and the ongoing quest to live a fulfilled, healthy life. Health is a journey and its mean to be explored! On Morocco’s coast, initiatives combine education, play, and sustainability to raise environmental awareness. The “Clean and Play” program encourages children to clean beaches in exchange for fun activities. Recycling also creates jobs for marginalized people. Sports and nature connection strengthen the link between health and environment.

programme.title: My Day Dubai
programme.desc: Gabriela Miloda, our engaging presenter, invites you to the sumptuous palaces of a thousand and one nights where well-being was invented. She will show you the trendy activities for fitness or free time as a solo, couple or family. In addition, you will cook balanced dishes with the greatest chefs. Let us take you on this luxury trip to Dubai. In this episode, our host Gabriela will spend her day at the beautiful Royal Meridien. Shell learn new recipes with Chef Jorge at Brasserie 2.0. Shell enjoy a very special facial at the hotels spa, before taking wakeboarding lessons with Coach Mike at sunset.

programme.title: Origami
programme.desc: A square piece of paper and some patience, this is all you need to transform a flat surface into a superb tridimensional piece of art! Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: In the eyes of a champ
programme.desc: 5 champions, in 5 different disciplines, have set themselves a major challenge that they will try to achieve at all costs. We follow 17-year-old Maria Benach, who lives in Barcelona and has been climbing since she was six. She was able to join the Spanish Federation to start competing in international competitions.

programme.title: Our Five Senses
programme.desc: Our Five Senses. Since the dawn of time, humans have needed touch to feel alive. At every moment, our skin comes into contact with our environment, giving this sense its full importance...

programme.title: My Zen Trendy
programme.desc: In My Zen Trendy, our presenter Val Kahl will show you the latest lifestyle trends about food, beauty, yoga, and wellness. Luxurious hotels, special yoga classes, massages, or detox juices.... There is something for everyone. Adopt the zen attitude! Val takes us to Los Angeles, on the roof of one of the most prestigious hotels in Beverly Hills for a session of acro yoga, aerial acrobatic yoga. Then, in the heart of Downtown, Val will experience a glass slide down one of the tallest towers in California. Shell also try SandBox Fitness, the trendy indoor surfing class, before trying Lazerfit, a new way to work out that combines warm-up, stretching and laser tag.

programme.sub-title: Bhakti Flow: Open Your Upper Back and Shoulders
programme.desc: Namaste Yoga. Bhakti Flow calls for an expansion of your entire being through the practice of bhakti, devotion. A practice of balance and strength that will call attention to the places in the body where tension hides, overlooked. Learn to be spacious with your breath, and surrender to the way of the sequence.

programme.title: Home training
programme.desc: Enjoy our tutorials and coaching, exercises, and practical lifestyle tips to help you live better. This episode of "Home Training" is dedicated to a dynamic and effective abs-thighs session. Structured into two blocks, the session targets the quadriceps and abdominals with a variety of exercises that strengthen the entire lower body. The focus is on posture and movement fluidity for in-depth work without the risk of injury. Accessible and motivating, this session promises to make you sweat while sculpting your muscles.

programme.title: Pilates
programme.desc: Stay in shape with our pilates courses!

programme.title: Namaste Yoga
programme.sub-title: Stabilize and Center: Strengthen Your Core and Open Your Hips
programme.desc: Namaste Yoga. Stabilize and Center allows for the creation of a deeper connection with your core, as well as the present moment. Through the practice of conscious breathing, movement and attention to the postures, a state of centered awareness can be cultivated.

programme.title: Health Explored with Mike Wahl
programme.sub-title: Japan - Okinawa - The Purpose of Life Part I
programme.desc: Health Explored delves deep into the subject of global health, revealing that well-being isn’t just an internal state but is also influenced by community, culture, a passion for helping others, and the capacity to challenge our own limits. This series is about health and our connection to the natural world, the resilience of the human spirit, and the ongoing quest to live a fulfilled, healthy life. Health is a journey and its mean to be explored! We travel to the Japanese island known for having some of the oldest people on Earth. We engage with leading scientists who have identified the "Longevity Gene," offering a glimpse into the genetic factors that contribute to extended lifespans. Beyond genetics, we explore the deeply ingrained cultural practices that sustain long, fulfilling lives in Okinawa. We delve into the importance of "moai," a lifelong social network that supports residents into their golden years, and the principle of "Hara Hachi Bu," which advises eating until youre 80% full while focusing on nourishing foods. But at the core of Okinawan longevity, we find "ikigai"—a profound sense of life purpose. From practicing martial arts to active community participation, we discover that Okinawan seniors maintain a vibrant sense of purpose in various facets of life. Join us on this enlightening journey to learn how the pillars of social support, mindful eating, and a strong sense of ikigai could enhance your ow.

programme.title: Born For This
programme.desc: Born For This aims to empower Filipinos by breaking the stigma surrounding mental health, spreading educational awareness and guidance on holistic practices, and building community connection and support. The Fuel to Flourish Fellowship is made up of health experts and practitioners whose mission is to empower people to take control of their bodies and minds. Their goal is to promote everyones right to well-being.

programme.title: Our Five Senses
programme.desc: Our Five Senses. Since the dawn of time, humans have needed touch to feel alive. At every moment, our skin comes into contact with our environment, giving this sense its full importance...

programme.title: Health at the forefront
programme.desc: Take advantage of this new season to refocus with MyZen TV. Each week, discover new wellness tips to live zen, eat zen, move zen, explore zen, and create zen.

programme.title: Deco Masters
programme.desc: Deco Masters. This week, Kenelm, Aurelie, Virginie and Fred are the candidates for the title of Ace of the Week. But before they go head-to-head on their building sites, our budding decorators have a meeting in the Brussels workshop. Its a chance for them to gauge their opponents. On this first day of competition, Kenelm takes to the stage. At just 24, this Brussels native is the youngest decorator of the week. With a degree in architecture, he has developed a style all his own. An adept of minimalism and respectful of materials above all else, he hides another secret weapon...

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. Honey was the first sweet condiment in history! It has also been known and consumed as a remedy since Antiquity. In France, we find an infinite variety of honey: acacia, chestnut, fir, rosemary, orange, spruce, oak, linden or lavender... Well cross forests, fields and even towns, as bees also forage in urbanized areas. Well then cook up emblematic recipes like Vercel gingerbread. Finally, well discover the European dark bee. Protecting this 80-million-year-old bee has become the spearhead of some passionate beekeepers.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Crafting
programme.desc: Passionate crafters are given the opportunity to turn their hobby into a business. Four passionate hobby crafters showcase their talents at the Crafty Vintage Fair at Lowther Castle in Penrith, Cumbria. From intricate needle-felt creations to imaginative plastic sculptures and beautifully crafted wooden furniture, each maker strives to turn their passion into success. This episode captures their creative journeys, the challenges they face, and the thrill of presenting their work at a prestigious fair. Will their crafts capture the hearts of visitors and lead to life-changing opportunities?

programme.title: My Zen People
programme.desc: They have changed their lives to follow their passions, even if that means leaving everything behind…. Born in Mexico but always attracted to new cultures and countries, Yesmin worked many jobs until she finally found her calling. She decided to merge her passions for art and travel and became a “Vagabond Artist”. She is now able to travel the world while making a living by painting beautiful murals in her own distinct style.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Crafting
programme.desc: Passionate crafters are given the opportunity to turn their hobby into a business. Three hobby crafters present their works for the first time at Brancepeth Castle Craft Fair in Durham. Occupational therapist Olivia dyes her own yarn and produces hand-woven pieces, ex-builder Neil makes quirky metal ornaments and Wendi now makes her own glass pieces uses the art of fusing - and for the fair she even learns the art of glass blowing.

programme.title: My Zen People
programme.desc: They have changed their lives to follow their passions, even if that means leaving everything behind…. After graduating with a Law degree, Ika built a career as a legal manager and advisor. For a decade she worked on risk-related matters. One day, she decided to take a big calculated risk of her own and give up her law-life to pursue a passion for jewelry-making. Her creations are inspired by her travels and the natural materials surrounding her.

programme.title: Home training
programme.desc: Enjoy our tutorials and coaching, exercises, and practical lifestyle tips to help you live better. Then, they introduce boxing movements to build arm strength and improve coordination. Cardio exercises are included to raise the heart rate and boost endurance. All in a motivating atmosphere—ideal for an energy boost from the comfort of home!

programme.title: Ways to School
programme.desc: Ways to School. Kritika is 11 and lives in the rugged mountains of the Himalayas in Nepal, along with her mother and her grandparents. Her father went to work in Dubai. Every morning, leading a group of schoolchildren from the village, she crosses steep paths, frail bridges and waterfalls to reach her school.

programme.title: Ways to School
programme.desc: Ways to School. Jose Alfredo, 12, has been blind from birth. But that doesnt stop him from living in one of the worlds biggest cities: Mexico City. The dangers of moving around in such a metropolis are exacerbated for a blind person. Despite this, Jose Alfredo embarks on a 2-hour journey every day, relying solely on his intuition, his cane, and the help of his little brother.

programme.title: Health Explored with Mike Wahl
programme.sub-title: Sahara - Sands of Time Part II
programme.desc: Health Explored delves deep into the subject of global health, revealing that well-being isn’t just an internal state but is also influenced by community, culture, a passion for helping others, and the capacity to challenge our own limits. This series is about health and our connection to the natural world, the resilience of the human spirit, and the ongoing quest to live a fulfilled, healthy life. Health is a journey and its mean to be explored! In the Sahara, we spend a night under the stars after a camel trek. Nomads share their lifestyle adapted to extreme conditions and the effects of climate change. Moroccan culture teaches us to slow down and savor each moment, valuing time and connection to nature.

programme.title: My Day Dubai

Afterwards the two have kitesurf lessons and lots of fun. Gabriela ends her day with some dance flow yoga with her trainer Steph by sunset.

programme.title: Health Explored with Mike Wahl
programme.sub-title: Buthan - The Pursuit of Happiness Part II
programme.desc: Health Explored delves deep into the subject of global health, revealing that well-being isn’t just an internal state but is also influenced by community, culture, a passion for helping others, and the capacity to challenge our own limits. This series is about health and our connection to the natural world, the resilience of the human spirit, and the ongoing quest to live a fulfilled, healthy life. Health is a journey and its mean to be explored! In the emotionally charged episode host Mike honors a deeply personal commitment to his late father, who passed away from cancer, to seek out the true meaning of happiness. Following this heartfelt promise, we venture to Bhutan, a remarkable country where happiness is not merely an emotion, but a national policy ingrained in its culture. From the lively capital of Thimphu to the peaceful farmlands of Punakha, we explore how Bhutan has seamlessly woven well-being into all aspects of life—from its education system that teaches happiness as a subject to its communities that prioritize collective well-being. This journey serves as both a tribute to Mikes father and an investigation into how Bhutans unique approach to happiness could offer transformative insights for our own lives. Join us on this poignant and enlightening trip to the Land of the Thunder Dragon as we delve into what happiness truly means, fulfilling a promise and enriching our understanding of lifes greatest pursuit.

programme.title: Ville jegere
programme.desc: Ville jegere. Trass i det forhistoriske utseendet er reptilene sofistikerte dyr som er fulle av overraskelser. Og som dinosaurene, er reptilene dyktige jegere.

programme.title: Ville jegere
programme.desc: Ville jegere. Under jakten er slangene mestere til å vurdere det nøyaktige øyeblikket som betyr forskjellen på liv og død.

programme.title: Ville jegere
programme.desc: Ville jegere. Ulvene er kanskje det fremste eksempelet på dyr som jakter sammen, basert på hierarkiet og lojaliteten i flokken.

programme.title: Ville jegere
programme.desc: Ville jegere. Den nye årstiden utløser store forandringer i bjørnens kropp. De kan overleve under tøffe forhold, men det fører også til ekstrem adferd.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. De hemmelige triksene til store kattedyr i kamp, med adrenalinrike kamper fra Afrika, Amerika med mer.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: En spennende dyrelivsserie som tilbyr nye perspektiver på episke kamper mellom rovdyr og byttedyrene deres. Her avsløres det hvordan jegere som løver, krokodiller og geparder tilpasser seg for å forfølge, jakte og fange ofrene deres. Eksperter på å få ned noen av de største dyrene på planeten, bruker vi etterforskning for å utforske hva som gjør geparder til så effektive rovdyr. Gjennom et nytt perspektiv på taktikken som brukes av disse kunnskapsrike morderne, ser vi hvordan en ung gepardmor lærer sine tre unger jaktens hemmeligheter.

programme.title: Ville jegere
programme.desc: Ville jegere. Ulvene er kanskje det fremste eksempelet på dyr som jakter sammen, basert på hierarkiet og lojaliteten i flokken.

programme.desc: Ville jegere. Den nye årstiden utløser store forandringer i bjørnens kropp. De kan overleve under tøffe forhold, men det fører også til ekstrem adferd.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Phil Breslin viser oss ikoniske dyrearter, og avslører deres unike tilpasninger og standhaftige karakteristikker. Vi får også se hvilke dyr som er best rustet for å overleve, fra ørken til hav, mangrover, regnskog og elver. Urfolkslærer Phil Breslin setter kursen mot konstant hete, luftfuktighet og regn i Australias regnskoger for å finne ut hva som kreves for å overleve. I tretoppene finner Phil de sky trekenguruene og babyene deres samt Australias største slange, den dødelige ametystpytonen. På bakken fungerer de fargerike kasuarene som regnskogens gartnere.

programme.title: Predator v Prey

programme.title: Amerikas ville steder
programme.desc: Vi får se landskaper og nasjonalparker som viser sine mest uberørte og ville sider. Vi reiser fra sør til nord og utforsker de fjerneste avkrokene til Appalachian Trail og møter forskerne som jobber for å bevare området.

programme.title: Amerikas ville steder
programme.desc: Vi får se landskaper og nasjonalparker som viser sine mest uberørte og ville sider. National Geographic blir med på en spennende reise over 445 kilometer for å utforske Grand Canyon og dens mysterier.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: En spennende dyrelivsserie som tilbyr nye perspektiver på episke kamper mellom rovdyr og byttedyrene deres. Her avsløres det hvordan jegere som løver, krokodiller og geparder tilpasser seg for å forfølge, jakte og fange ofrene deres. Eksperter på å få ned noen av de største dyrene på planeten, bruker vi etterforskning for å utforske hva som gjør geparder til så effektive rovdyr. Gjennom et nytt perspektiv på taktikken som brukes av disse kunnskapsrike morderne, ser vi hvordan en ung gepardmor lærer sine tre unger jaktens hemmeligheter.

programme.title: Utemmede Filippinene
programme.desc: Utemmede Filippinene. Vi begynner på den lille øya Batan, der vi treffer en unik slange og en utbredt landkrabbe.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Unike møter, safariattraksjoner og fascinerende reiser inn i villmarken. På en episk safari avslører vi hvordan grensen mellom jeger og bytte hviskes ut i villmarken. Vi ser på utrolige fremvisninger av rå, utemmet natur, fra elefanter som stormer gjennom bushen med en løve på støttennene til revirkamper mellom hannleoparder, og en flokk hyener som driver bort en løve fra sitt eget bøffelbytte.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: En spennende dyrelivsserie som tilbyr nye perspektiver på episke kamper mellom rovdyr og byttedyrene deres. Her avsløres det hvordan jegere som løver, krokodiller og geparder tilpasser seg for å forfølge, jakte og fange ofrene deres. Eksperter på å få ned noen av de største dyrene på planeten, bruker vi etterforskning for å utforske hva som gjør geparder til så effektive rovdyr. Gjennom et nytt perspektiv på taktikken som brukes av disse kunnskapsrike morderne, ser vi hvordan en ung gepardmor lærer sine tre unger jaktens hemmeligheter.

programme.title: Utemmede Filippinene
programme.desc: Utemmede Filippinene. Vi begynner på den lille øya Batan, der vi treffer en unik slange og en utbredt landkrabbe.

programme.title: Asias Wild Secrets
programme.desc: Asias Wild Secrets. Over hele Asia blir unge dyr kastet ut i ville kamper, og kjemper med nebb og klør for å i det hele tatt overleve. Hver eneste dag byr på nye utfordringer og farer.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol
programme.sub-title: Det bøtter på med katter og hunder
programme.desc: Vi blir med dr. Pol når han reiser rundt på landsbygda i Michigan, for å ta vare på kjæledyr og husdyr som trenger hans kompetanse. En ny sau er på vei til Pols gård, og familien ordner dreneringen i sauehuset. Den kalde vinteren er på vei, så det stinkende stedet må fikses raskt.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol: Høydepunkter
programme.desc: Få med deg høydepunktene fra den 10. sesongen til dr. Pol og teamet. Vi får se nødstilfeller på klinikken og utrykninger til gårdene. Selv i dårlig vær, og med vanskelige pasienter, gjør teamet det som trengs. Pels, fjær, skjell og syk? Pols veterinærklinikk behandler alle som ikke er mennesker og møter mange forskjellige og sjeldne dyrearter. Dr. Pol kan undersøke om ei ku er drektig, men hva med en kamel? En skilpadde med fordøyelsesvansker, en chinchilla som må undersøkes og en kenguru med tannpine skaper oppstyr på klinikken. Når araen Merlins nebb har blitt for langt, gir dr. Pol han en tiltrengt nebb-ikyr.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol
programme.desc: Vi blir med dr. Pol når han reiser rundt på landsbygda i Michigan, for å ta vare på kjæledyr og husdyr som trenger hans kompetanse. I sommervarmen jobber veterinærene utrettelig for å redde en hardt skadet katt, en hund med et dypt sår og en miniatyrhest som har vanskelig for å gå. Det store kaoset bryter ut da man tar imot flere ildere og høner på en gang. Senere gir Pols nye hundevalp klinikken enda mer å styre med.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Blekkspruter er som jordens romvesener: tre hjerter, blått blod, evne til å skvise seg gjennom åpninger på størrelse med et øyeeple. Men det er så mye mer ved disse rare og utrolige dyrene. Intelligente nok til å bruke verktøy og forandre kroppene sine til å etterligne andre dyr, selv kommunisere med andre arter. Blekksprutens hemmeligeter er mer ekstraordinære enn vi noen gang har forestilt oss. Blekkspruter er et av de mest bemerkelsesverdige dyrene på planeten, men de har en superkraft som setter dem høyt og over resten. Ved å endre farge hundrevis av ganger i timen eller forandre formen på kroppen for å etterligne deres dødeligste fiender, er de verdens mest ekstraordinære formskiftere.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Blekkspruter er som jordens romvesener: tre hjerter, blått blod, evne til å skvise seg gjennom åpninger på størrelse med et øyeeple. Men det er så mye mer ved disse rare og utrolige dyrene. Intelligente nok til å bruke verktøy og forandre kroppene sine til å etterligne andre dyr, selv kommunisere med andre arter. Blekksprutens hemmeligeter er mer ekstraordinære enn vi noen gang har forestilt oss. Bevæpnet med en ekstraordinær rekke superkrefter bryter Octopuses alle reglene når det kommer til dyrs intelligens. Født inn i verden som foreldreløse, er de selvlærte masterminds som er i stand til å løse komplekse problemer, legge strategier og til og med planlegge for fremtiden.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Blekkspruter er som jordens romvesener: tre hjerter, blått blod, evne til å skvise seg gjennom åpninger på størrelse med et øyeeple. Men det er så mye mer ved disse rare og utrolige dyrene. Intelligente nok til å bruke verktøy og forandre kroppene sine til å etterligne andre dyr, selv kommunisere med andre arter. Blekksprutens hemmeligeter er mer ekstraordinære enn vi noen gang har forestilt oss. Selv om blekksprut alltid har vært antatt å være naturens ultimate ensomme, er sannheten at de viser overraskende sosial atferd. Fra mødre som henger med hverandre til å jobbe sammen med en annen art, disse bemerkelsesverdige skapningene er faktisk mer omgjengelige enn noen gang har forestilt seg.

programme.title: Sharkfest
programme.sub-title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Vi ser nærmere på nylige angrep mot mennesker og avslører ukjente sider av adferden. Det blir et tett møte med en av verdens mest misforståtte dyr - den utrolige haien. Bertie drar til Sør-Afrika på sin mest vågale misjon så langt. Havet utenfor Sør-Afrika er et favorittområde for et av havets mest berømte og fryktede rovdyr, hvithaien. Bertie dykker på grunt vann uten beskyttelsesbur for å filme når hvithaiene jakter på sel. Etter å ha besøkt dem i deres habitat, ser han på hvilke utfordringer de står overfor på grunn av klimaendringene.

programme.title: Delfiner på nært hold med bertie gregory
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory er på Azorene, et marinfristed og viktig stoppested for havets rovdyr når de forflytter seg utenfor kysten av Portugal. Det er foringssesong, og tusenvis av normalt sky rovdyr kommer sammen for å jakte og spise store fiskestimer kalt stimballer. Et vidstrakt hav og kraftige stormer utfordrer teamet, som håper på å få muligheten til å filme det mest spektakulære etegildet i Berties karriere.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Unike møter, safariattraksjoner og fascinerende reiser inn i villmarken. Vi drar ut på en gripende safari gjennom Afrikas ville elver og vannhull, og er vitne til eksplosive kamper som starter i vannkanten. Usynlighet og smyging er de ultimate overlevelsesverktøyene i Afrikas utemmede vannveier, fra en gepard som forsvinner fra overflaten på sekunder til en krokodille mot ti løver, og en bøffel i drakamp med en krokodilles nese.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Unike møter, safariattraksjoner og fascinerende reiser inn i villmarken. På en episk safari avslører vi hvordan grensen mellom jeger og bytte hviskes ut i villmarken. Vi ser på utrolige fremvisninger av rå, utemmet natur, fra elefanter som stormer gjennom bushen med en løve på støttennene til revirkamper mellom hannleoparder, og en flokk hyener som driver bort en løve fra sitt eget bøffelbytte.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Unike møter, safariattraksjoner og fascinerende reiser inn i villmarken. De travle vannhullene i Sør-Afrika setter scenen for brutale kamper mellom erkefiender. På vei ut for å se på vilt får vi sete på første rad når løvene benytter seg av kaoset under en stor panikkflukt, og brutalt dreper fire bøfler. Senere er det et annet stort slag som finner sted i en halvveis uttørket elv når en bøffel må kjempe mot fire store kattedyr.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Unike møter, safariattraksjoner og fascinerende reiser inn i villmarken. Et vidstrakt hav og kraftige stormer utfordrer teamet, som håper på å få muligheten til å filme det mest spektakulære etegildet i Berties karriere.

programme.title: Præriehundenes rike
programme.desc: Præriehundenes rike gir oss et innblikk i den unike oppførselen og forholdene til præriehundene som bor i Valles Caldera National Preserve nord i New Mexico. Med en blanding av dokumentariske filmopptak og fortellerstemme, tar hver episode publikum med på en personlig reise som følger noen utvalgte præriehunder. På slettene vil Furgie hjelpe den gravide enken etter kampen mot Brutus.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Phil Breslin viser oss ikoniske dyrearter, og avslører deres unike tilpasninger og standhaftige karakteristikker. Vi får også se hvilke dyr som er best rustet for å overleve, fra ørken til hav, mangrover, regnskog og elver. Urfolkslærer Phil Breslin drar ut til Australias notoriske våtmarker for å finne tre dyr som er laget for dette fuktige og våte miljøet. Phil står ansikt til ansikt med den unike australske fersvannskrokodillen, en stor rovfisk kalt barramundi samt saltvannskrokodillen, et av verdens farligste dyr og største krypdyr.

programme.title: Villmarkens utfordringer
programme.desc: Dyrenes vandring er blant det mest storslåtte man kan se i naturen. På land, i luften og i vannet; mange dyr må forflytte seg for å overleve. Våren er i anmarsj, og dyr fra hele Sør-Atlanteren samler seg på Falklandsøyene.

programme.title: Villmarkens utfordringer
programme.desc: Dyrenes vandring er blant det mest storslåtte man kan se i naturen. På land, i luften og i vannet; mange dyr må forflytte seg for å overleve. Hvert år forflytter flere generasjoner med monarksommerfugler seg fra Mexico til Canada og tilbake igjen.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Følg med når de ville dyrene går til krig, alt fra mordere i miniatyr til digre bøller. Bli med når vi avslører taktikkene og strategiene bak naturens mest episke slåsskamper. Fra de afrikanske slettene til den snødekte villmarken i Nord-Amerika, avslører vi hvordan naturens dødeligste kamper kjempes om territorier, dominans og paring.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. De hemmelige triksene til store kattedyr i kamp, med adrenalinrike kamper fra Afrika, Amerika med mer.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Et blikk på naturens kaldblodigste mordere. Enkelte er eksperter på bakholdsangrep, noen har skarpe hoggtenner og andre kan kvele deg i hjel.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Løver møtes til duell, ulver tar seg av en grizzlybjørn og en av verdens største apekatter har drapsplaner.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Afrika er hjem til naturens mest fryktede rovdyr som geparder, løver og hyener med flere. I villmarken er kampen om overlevelse aldri ensidig. Selv om Afrikas drapsmaskiner er noen av de beste jegerne i dyreriket, er byttedyrene deres formidable på sin egen måte. Vær vitne til at en gepardmor møtes ansikt til ansikt med en gaselles kraftige våpen, og se hva som skjer når tre hann-løver gjør sitt livs feil, og prøver å slakte et stridslystent neshorn.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Et blikk på naturens kaldblodigste mordere. Enkelte er eksperter på bakholdsangrep, noen har skarpe hoggtenner og andre kan kvele deg i hjel.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. En hunnleopard slåss om lunsjen mot en stor hann, og se hvordan nilvaranen bruker halen som et dødelig våpen.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Se hva som skjer når dyr kjemper på liv og død.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Noen av de dødeligste kampene i dyreriket kjempes mellom artsfrender og mellom rovdyr og byttedyr. I dyreriket kommer ofte den dødelige faren når du minst venter det, og dyrene gjør hva som helst for å spise, beskytte ungene sine og føre blodslinjen videre.

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Fra de afrikanske slettene til den snødekte villmarken i Nord-Amerika, avslører vi hvordan naturens dødeligste kamper kjempes om territorier, dominans og paring.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol: Høydepunkter
programme.desc: Få med deg høydepunktene fra den 10. sesongen til dr. Pol og teamet. Vi får se nødstilfeller på klinikken og utrykninger til gårdene. Selv i dårlig vær, og med vanskelige pasienter, gjør teamet det som trengs. Jøss! Det ser man ikke hver dag. I denne spesialepisoden blir dr. Pols ekspertise og intuisjon satt på prøve av de merkeligste og mest fantastiske pasientene. En katt føler at verden snurrer rundt, en Jack Russell har vondt i øynene og en babyponni besvimer. Nå blir de kunnskapsrike satt på prøve.

programme.title: De siste neshornene: et nytt håp
programme.desc: Fotograf Ami Vitale følger en dristig global innsats for å redde stumpneshornet fra utryddelse. Det finnes kun to hunner, og forskere må skynde seg for å ordne verdens første surrogatgraviditet for neshorn. Skjebnen til denne ikoniske arten ligger nå i hendene til dyrepassere, skogvoktere og forskere som kjemper mot alle odds for å redde arten før det er for sent.

programme.title: Dyrefikserne: Landsbygdas veterinærer
programme.desc: På Critter Fixer Veterinary Hospital i det landlige Georgia eier og driver dr. Hodges og dr. Ferguson en livlig veterinærklinikk. Sammen med staben behandler de dyr i alle former og størrelser. Dr. Hodges og Dr. Ferguson blir æret av lokalsamfunnet og utnevnt til Grand Marshals på Macon Cherry Blossom Festival. Før de kan kjøre til paraden, må dyrlegene hos Dyrefikserne hjelpe en hane etter et angrep, prøve å redde livet til en elsket pasient og hjelpe med fødselen til fransk bulldog-valper. De må også sjekke klumpene på en rotte og lage en liten splint og skjerm til en parakitts bein.

programme.title: Veterinærer i Midtvesten
programme.desc: Ben og Erin Schroeder bor og jobber i hjertet av Amerika. Den brutale Midtvest-vinteren byr på et bredt spekter av utfordringer når de møter stadig skiftende hindringer som står mellom dem og dyrenes helse. Schroeders kjører tusenvis av kilometer med lastebilen sin når de krysser Amerikas Heartland for å behandle alle store og små skapninger. Schroeder-paret skynder seg til unnsetning når en bilulykke skader tre kjære hester. På klinikken fryser Erin av en shih poos kløende "gammelhundsvorter

programme.title: Dyrenes Fight Club
programme.desc: Når de villeste dyrene i naturen kjemper med livet som innsats, er det ikke alltid gitt hvem som vinner. Vi tar en nærmere titt på noen av de tøffeste oppgjørene i dyreriket. Følg med når de ville dyrene går til krig, alt fra mordere i miniatyr til digre bøller. Bli med når vi avslører taktikkene og strategiene bak naturens mest episke slåsskamper.
